parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - HTML

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns [[true]] when HTML content was successfully loaded.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlHTMLLoaded''' control

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[htmlLoad]] "test.html";
[[if]] (![[ctrlHTMLLoaded]] _control) [[then]] {
    [[hint]] "Loading test.html failed!";
};
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[htmlLoad]], [[Arma: GUI Configuration]]
</value></part></template>
